item.title: Prices
item.description: Prices: Weekend (3 nights) Thursday 4pm - Sunday 10am Low season 1 October - 31 May: 130€ Peak season 1 June - 30 September: 160€ Midweek (4 nights) Sunday 4 pm - Thursday 10 am Low season: 150€ Peak season: 190€ Week (7 nights) Sunday 4 pm - Sunday 10 am Low season: 245€ Peak season: 300€ Per night Low season: 55€/night Peak season: 65€/night Breakfast: 10€/person Dinner is available
